personal.name: David Beckham
personal.title: Associate Software Engineer
personal.bio: I architect intelligent solutions at the intersection of AI and full-stack development. From building accessibility-first applications to automating complex workflows, I transform ideas into impactful digital experiences.
personal.closingBio: Ready to collaborate on something extraordinary? I'm always excited to connect with fellow innovators, explore cutting-edge projects, and push the boundaries of what's possible with technology. Let's build the future together.
story: With over 8 years of experience in full-stack development and more than 3 years of experience in AI/ML Engineering, I've had the privilege of working with vibrant teams across enterprise companies, building everything from MVPs to large-scale applications serving millions of users.

My journey has been defined by creating meaningful impact through technology. From research publications to innovation competitions, I've consistently focused on building solutions that genuinely improve people's lives. Whether working on accessibility, security, or wellness applications, I'm driven by the belief that technology should be both powerful and purposeful.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me contributing to open-source projects, writing technical articles, or maybe gaming. I believe in continuous learning and sharing knowledge with the community.

experience.title: AI & Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Designed and deployed AI-powered web applications combining Django REST API backends, React.js frontends, and machine learning models.
achievements: Built NLP-based features (sentiment analysis, text summarization, Chatbots) using spaCy, Hugging Face Transformers, and Scikit-learn, increasing customer engagement by 25%
Deployed ML models as REST APIs with FastAPI/Flask, enabling real-time inference at scale (1,000+ req/sec)
Created data pipelines for preprocessing and training large datasets with Pandas, NumPy, and Scikit-learn, reducing model training time by 30%.
Worked closely with data scientists and product teams to translate business requirements into production-ready AI solutions.

experience.title: Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Built modern single-page applications (SPAs) with React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS, improving user experience and UI consistency.
achievements: Engineered and deployed scalable microservices using Django REST Framework and FastAPI, handling 50k+ daily requests.
Wrote unit and integration tests (PyTest, Jest) and achieved 85%+ code coverage, ensuring application stability and maintainability.
Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Google Maps) to extend application functionality and drive business revenue
Improved application performance by 40% through code refactoring, caching strategies, and database optimization.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained a full-stack web application using Django and React, resulting in a 15% increase in user retention and a 10 % boost in customer satisfaction.
achievements: Implemented authentication and authorization (JWT, OAuth2, Google Login) to enhance application security and user experience.
Built reusable UI components with React and Bootstrap, reducing frontend development time by 20%.
Optimized SQL queries and database indexes, improving system performance and reducing query execution time by 35%.
Wrote unit and integration tests with PyTest and Jest, maintaining 80%+ code coverage for reliability.

projects.title: Doxy me
projects.subtitle: Telemedicine Platform
projects.description: Doxy is a telemedicine platform offering secure, simple, and easy-to-use video calling solutions for healthcare providers to connect with patients virtually. It emphasizes patient privacy and complies with healthcare regulations.
projects.longDescription: Research project under Unisys & Ramaiah Institute of Technology focusing on multimodal generative AI for accessibility. Combines LLAVA-1.5, Gemma 7B, and Detectron2 for reduced hallucinations and enhanced object recognition.

projects.title: PlasBit
projects.subtitle: Financial Management Platform
projects.description: Plasbit is a financial management platform that provides businesses with tools to manage their finances effectively. It offers features like expense tracking, invoicing, and financial reporting, all while ensuring data security and compliance with regulations.
projects.longDescription: Research project providing comprehensive passwordless authentication solutions for web and mobile applications. Implements Facenet for facial verification, Resemblyzer for voice recognition, and WebAuthn API for FIDO authentication.

projects.title: Memoirs
projects.subtitle: Mental Health Platform
projects.description: Mental health surveillance and assessment platform for teens and students. Features personalized music recommendations with Solfeggio frequencies and AI-powered mental health assistance.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive mental health platform analyzing journal entries to provide personalized support. Integrates specific brain-targeting frequencies and AI-driven goal generation for depression support.

projects.title: StudentBuzz
projects.subtitle: Student Collaboration Platform
projects.description: A collaborative platform that empowers students to showcase their skills, projects, and accomplishments while fostering a vibrant community of learning and collaboration.
projects.longDescription: Full-stack platform enabling students to create comprehensive profiles highlighting skills and achievements, join clubs, collaborate across colleges, and share educational resources. Features inter-college collaboration, club activities, and notification systems.

projects.title: Luxico
projects.subtitle: Booking platform
projects.description: Full-stack application for Luxico booking system built with modern React and Django technologies and beautiful UI components.
projects.longDescription: Modern React frontend for booking management featuring responsive design with Tailwind CSS, interactive charts with Recharts, and comprehensive UI components using Shadcn. Integrates with backend booking management system.

projects.title: Notrios
projects.subtitle: ERP System
projects.description: Notrios is an ERP system designed to streamline business processes and improve overall efficiency. It offers a range of features, including inventory management, order processing, and customer relationship management, all within a user-friendly interface.
projects.longDescription: Notrios is an ERP system designed to streamline business processes and improve overall efficiency. It offers a range of features, including inventory management, order processing, and customer relationship management, all within a user-friendly interface.

projects.title: Bubble Bop
projects.subtitle: QR-Based Restaurant Management
projects.description: Hotel management system that takes orders for each table based on scanning QR codes available at tables, streamlining the dining experience.
projects.longDescription: Django-based restaurant management system featuring QR code table ordering, MongoDB integration, email notifications, and comprehensive order management. Includes both customer-facing ordering interface and restaurant management dashboard.

projects.title: FJallRaven
projects.subtitle: E-commerce Website
projects.description: FjÃ¤llrÃ¤ven is a Swedish outdoor brand known for its durable, functional, and eco-friendly products, including backpacks, clothing, and accessories. The company emphasizes sustainability, using materials like organic cotton and recycled polyester.
projects.longDescription: Django-based file conversion platform supporting multiple file formats with bulk processing capabilities. Features user-friendly interface for seamless file format conversions, developed as part of hackathon competition.

projects.title: Huno
projects.subtitle: Car Renting Website
projects.description: Hunos is a car rental and tokenized vehicle project using RWA & DEPIN.
projects.longDescription: Node.js-based car rental platform utilizing RWA & DEPIN for tokenized vehicle management. Features include user-friendly booking interface, real-time vehicle tracking, and secure payment processing.

projects.title: Swom
projects.subtitle: Home Swapping Website
projects.description: Swom is a home swapping platform that allows users to exchange homes for vacations.
projects.longDescription: Node.js-based home swapping platform enabling users to list their homes, browse available swaps, and manage bookings. Features include user-friendly interface, real-time availability tracking, and secure payment processing.

projects.title: yummyCake
projects.subtitle: E-commerce Website
projects.description: yummyCake is an online bakery platform offering a wide range of delicious cakes and pastries.
projects.longDescription: Django-based e-commerce platform for an online bakery, featuring user-friendly interface, secure payment processing, and real-time order tracking.

projects.title: Observer.ai
projects.subtitle: CRM system
projects.description: Observer.ai is a CRM system that leverages AI for enhanced customer interactions.
projects.longDescription: Node.js-based CRM platform utilizing AI for customer insights and engagement. Features include user-friendly dashboard, real-time analytics, and seamless integration with existing tools.

seo.title: David Beckham - AI Engineer & Full-Stack Developer
